LIEUTENANT 
I 
A 
staff 
member must 
observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked 
down status, such as administrative 
detention or 
disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 
minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 
a.m.— 
12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in 
the second 30 minutes period of the same 
hour (example, 
12:30 am —  I:00 a.m.), 
thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least 
twice per hour. These rounds are to be 
conducted on an irregular schedule and no 
more than 40 minutes apart. All 
observations must be 
documented. 
REVIEWED BY MORNING 
WATCH LIEUTENANT  
CAPTAIN 
EFTA00032363
